subject: Order Shipping Information
description_text:
Order number: #SSN5085

I ordered on December 19th and still have not received any information about my purchase other than an order confirmation. Is there a timeline for when I can expect my product to be shipped?

conversations.body_text: Hi Bailey Zampardi,  I apologize for not responding to you promptly. I have confirmed that your package has been delivered. Have you received it?  You can track your shipping information via the following link:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=JSELV2420396209YQ
